1. To begin, in order to access the sequence read archives easily, download the NCBI SRA Toolkit.

  2. The sra files can be downloaded from the command line using:

fastq-dump -X 5 -Z SRR390728

and they will be stored here (on a Mac OSX machine):

/Users/[username]/ncbi/public
  1. The raw data is hosted at this gene expression omnibus (GEO) site.
